about_the_game:
WARNO’s Early Access Pack celebrates the community's invaluable and continued support of the game’s development in Early Access.

MAIN FEATURES:


The Early Access Pack features 7 extra Divisions, 3 of them representing forces in and around a Cold War-era divided Berlin and 4 additional Divisions.

Battle for Berlin

  • NATO’s Berlin Command contains the combined forces of three Western Allied garrisons stationed in West Berlin during the Cold War.
  • The Soviet 6th Separate Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade is East Berlin’s powerful counterpart to the NATO garrisons stationed in West Berlin.
  • The East German Berliner Gruppierung is built up around a Nationale Volksarmee’s motorized rifle division, its wartime task to eliminate West Berlin as part of Unternehmen Zentrum.

Additional Divisions

  • The American 24th Infantry Division (Mechanized) contains a substantial National Guard component. Based in the United States, it is earmarked to reinforce NATO in West Germany during WARNO’s war scenario.
  • The US 35th Infantry Division is a true National Guard formation and, thanks to its plentiful armored battalions, acts as a missing link between a US Army’s mechanized and tank divisions. Many of its units feature the Reservist trait.
  • The Soviet 27th Guards Motorized Rifle Division was used to trial the latest Cold War equipment available to the Soviet Army as part of the “Division 90” concept.
  • The mixed East German and Polish Rügener Gruppierung contains various anti-landing detachments and formations under a single, unified command.

Early Access Pack features:

  • 7 new Divisions for both NATO and Warsaw Pact.
  • New units and models including FV432 RARDEN, F-117A NIGHTHAWK stealth bomber, MIRAGE IV, KGB’s elite Spetsgruppa “A”, L-39ZO, 2S5 GIATSINT-S, National Guard units, and much more.

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: WARNO - Early Access Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: WARNO Early Access Pack features 7 unique Divisions, from NATO’s Berlin Command to the high-end Soviet 27th Guards Motorized Rifle Division. A host of new units are featured, from the F-117A Nighthawk, Mirage IV bomber, KGB’s elite Spetsgruppa “A” to the U.S. National Guard.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
